content.raw:
another way to grow memory footprint:

1. start gzserver
1. start gzclient
1. add PR2 model using gzclient
1. visualize one of the cameras or visualize contacts in gzclient
1. suspend gzclient
1. gzserver memory usage will grow rapidly

Note resuming gzclient process will reduce gzserver memory back to normal, so this is technically not a memory leak.
content.html:
another way to grow memory footprint:

  1. start gzserver
  2. start gzclient
  3. add PR2 model using gzclient
  4. visualize one of the cameras or visualize contacts in gzclient
  5. suspend gzclient
  6. gzserver memory usage will grow rapidly

Note resuming gzclient process will reduce gzserver memory back to normal, so this is technically not a memory leak.
